√ghrā 'smell'

present: [3.] jíghrati (3p.)  jighrāṇa  jighratī   -- [1.] jíghrati etc. V.+  jíghrate etc.   -- [2.] ghrāti  

perfect: jaghrau  

aorist: [1.] aghrāt  ghrāyāt  ghreyāt  aghrāyi   -- [6.] aghrāsīt  

[future: ghrāsyati  ghrātā  ]

verbal: ghrātá B.+  ghrāṇa  ghrātvā  jighritvā  -ghrāya S.+  -jighrya S.+  -ghrā́yam  

secondary: passive: ghrāyate   -- intensive: jāghrā-  jeghrīya-   -- desiderative: jighrāsa-   -- causative: ghrāpayati etc. B.+  ajighrapat  ajighripat  

derivatives: -ghra  ghrā́ṇa B.+  ghrāti B.+  ghrātavyà B.+  ghrātṛ́ B.+  ghréya E.+  -jighra AV.+  -jighraṇa S.+  -ghrāpaṇa S.
